data.description: Bindings for the gtk+-2.x UI Toolkit
data.communities:
gtk-perl-list@gnome.org, #gtk-perl on ircd.gimp.org,
    http://gtk2-perl.sourceforge.net/ (news, rels, doc, tutorials, cvs,
    etc.)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Gtk was the original namespace of the bindings for gtk+-1.x. There
    were significant changes between gtk+ 1.x and 2.x that prevented the
    bindings from being able to bind both in any resonable manner. In
    addition both Gtk and Gtk2 are widely used and often will need to
    co-exist on systems.

    The Gtk2-Perl set of modules are part of the official Gnome
    Language Bindings set which requires adhereance to a set of rules
    about api stability and release numbering. The bindings are pretty
    complete (api-wise) as are the tests.
